title: Letha Weapon
text: The gentleman whom I spoke with today was more than helpful and very easy to understand. As I am a new resident to the state of Texas things are very different and I startedâ€‹ to get frustrated but he eased my frustrations in an instant and for that I'm very thankful. If I could give 19 stars I would.
